level.heading: Federal exclusion.
level.text: This chapter shall not be construed to:

Grant the Superintendent [Commissioner] or any other District agency jurisdiction over a federal association or any merger or consolidation of a federal association in which an association chartered by the District is not a party; or
Subject any federal association to any law or rule of the District or its agencies to which it is not otherwise subject.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-175
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-1201.
